text.text_translated: Most people believe that developing countries are in a terrible situation, suffering from great **poverty**, which is a situation where people do not have enough money for basic things like food or a home, and are governed by dictators, so there is little hope for any real change. However, this is far from the truth. In reality, a great transformation is happening. Over the past 20 years, more than 700 million people have earned more money and have left poverty. In addition, six million fewer children die every year from disease, millions more girls are now in school, and millions of people can get clean water.
